38487.name: Population younger than 15
38487.datasetName: Population Estimates and Projection - Wittgenstein Centre for Demography and Global Human Capital
38487.s_name: Medium SSP2 - Wittgenstein Centre for Demography and Global Human Capital

source.name: Medium SSP2 - Wittgenstein Centre for Demography and Global Human Capital
source.dataPublisherSource: These projections were produced by a large team of researchers at the Wittgenstein Centre for Demography and Global Human Capital and at other institutions.
source.additionalInfo: The new set of projections by levels of educational attainment was produced by a large team of researchers at the Wittgenstein Centre for Demography and Global Human Capital and at other institutions. It also includes population projections developed for the 5th assessment report of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) according to a set of Shared Socioeconomic Pathways (SSP) scenarios.
